alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Livingston (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 4:18PM EDT until July 25 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Buffalo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Livingston County in western New York... Northeastern Allegany County in western New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 418 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Portageville, or near Letchworth State Park, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dansville, Letchworth State Park, Nunda, Ossian, Canaseraga, Hunt, Dalton, Ossian Center, and Swain. This includes Interstate 390 between exits 4 and 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
